form.label: Forwarder Connections
form.description: Displays a list of all connected forwarders and their most recent connections

search.query: | tstats latest(_time) as latest where index=wineventlog , source=XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational by source,host | eval latest=now()- latest, latest=latest/60| rename latest as "Sysmon Log Minutes" , host as hostname | join hostname [search index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd group=tcpin_connections (connectionType=cooked OR connectionType=cookedSSL) fwdType=uf guid=* | stats max(_time) as last_connected, by guid, hostname,sourceHost | eval hostname = upper(hostname), last_connected=now() - last_connected , last_connected=last_connected/60 | rename last_connected as "Last Log Minutes" ] | table hostname , sourceHost, "Sysmon Log Minutes", "Last Log Minutes"
